A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a strong Star Wars fan and have been since the original movie. One of the problems I have with the latest movie is that if you know nothing of the previous movies\, it won't make sense. It relies so heavily on knowledge of previous movies that it doesn't stand on its own very well. Overall I enjoyed the movie\, even thru the slow parts. Not sure exactly why they had to drag some things out so much\, but I did enjoy the movie.
